inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 59, "index": 11}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 8, "index": 13}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 32, "index": 14}, {"type": "iron_axe", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "glowstone_dust", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}, {"type": "crying_obsidian", "quantity": 6, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft 3 glowstone blocks, and then craft the respawn anchor from the glowstone. I have 12 glowstone dust, so I will move 3 of them into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1
